title: ICE: edition 2021: self.lines.iter().all(|r| !r.iter().any(|sc| sc.chr == \'\\t\'))

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: E-needs-test
labels.description: Call for participation: writing correctness tests

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: requires-debug-assertions
labels.description: This issue requires debug-assertions in some way

body:
### Code note: it is crucial that between `await (` and `(move {` there is a tab and not a space ```Rust fn box () { (( h (const {( default ( await ( await ( (move {await((((}} ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.67.0-nightly (32e613bba 2022-12-02) binary: rustc commit-hash: 32e613bbaafee1bcabba48a2257b838f8d1c03d3 commit-date: 2022-12-02 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.67.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.4 ``` ### Error output `rustc --edition=2021 ` ``` ```
Backtrace
